document.full_text: british billionaire businessman and adventurer sir richard branson has plans to fly commercial passengers into space, but his terrestrial scheme to relocate endangered madagascar lemurs on a caribbean island he owns is getting flak from some conservation experts,
document.title: uk's richard branson gets flak for lemur relocation plan
lines_and_colors: british billionaire businessman and adventurer sir richard branson has plans to fly commercial passengers into space, but his terrestrial scheme to relocate endangered madagascar lemurs on a caribbean island he owns is getting flak from some conservation experts,
